sections.heading: Property; condemnation for streets; damages; how paid
sections.text: Payment of damages assessed for the appropriation of private property for streets, alleys or boulevards in cities of the first class may be made out of the general or any other surplus fund.SourceLaws 1903, c. 19, ยง 7, p. 239;R.S.1913, ยง 4906;C.S
